item.description:
As of Tuesday about 5 tickets remain.

This Event will sell out quickly so purchase your tickets today.

From The Great Fenway Park Writers Series:

This is a Thursday night, January, 17 dinner in the Esplanade Room at the Hotel Commonwealth at 6:30 pm as the Red Sox Writers Series honor the legendary Boston Globe Sports columnist Bob Ryan.  

Among those paying tribute will be Globe Sports Editor Joe Sullivan, sports columnist Dan Shaughnessy and Jackie MacMullen.

Globe, Bruins, Celtics, Patriots and others have been asked to join to honor Mr. Ryan.

Dinner cost is $60.00 Reservations may only be made through Ms. Katie Rippin at the Hotel Commonwealth. E Mail krippin@hotelcommonwealth.com or call 617-532-5010.

More info at www.fenwayparkwriters.org. 

Updates to follow.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by 6:15pm in lobby or inside event to sit at one table
item.name: The Great Fenway Park Writers Series-Dinner & Program Honoring ColumnistBob Ryan
